messages.Message: Good Afternoon Students, Practice problems 5 is scheduled and it will be available till 1st April 2016. - Vijayasherly

DEAR STUDENT, I HAVE RECEIVED A MAIL REGARDING UPLOADING OF DIGITAL ASSIGNMENT ONE. I FOUND IT IS BLOCK, IF IT IS NOT OPENED YOU CAN UPLOAD WHENEVER IT WILL OPENED. THE LAST DATE WILL BE EXTENDED ACCORDINGLY. YOU NEED SEND YOUR COPY TO ANY MAIL OR MY VIT MAIL. IT SHOULD BE UPLOADED THROUGH YOUR LOG IN ONLY. PL NOTE.
REVIEW ONE WILL BE CONDUCTED ON FRIDAY, 2016 AS PER INSTRUCTED IN THE CLASS TODAY.  PL CHECK "TOPIC OF DIGITAL ASSIGNMENT ONE" IN YOUR INTRA NET LOG IN.
REVIEW ONE WILL BE CONDUCTED ON WED MARCH 02, 2016. VENUE AND TIME WILL BE INFORM TOMORROW IN THE REGULAR CLASS. ALL GROUP MEMBERS ARE REQUESTED TO FOLLOW THIS SCHEDULE.
